Title: Relates to temporary certificates of compliance or occupancy
Summary: Relates to temporary certificates of compliance or occupancy; permits a single ninety day extension for temporary certificates of compliance or occupancy; requires a civil penalty of $20,000 for any violation regarding certificates of compliance or occupancy.
LawCode: Amd ยง301, Mult Dwell L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the multiple dwelling law, in relation to temporary certificates of compliance or occupancy
